DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated elective Cesarean section perform regional anaesthesia without extensive intra operative bowel adhesion . Women give consent participate study . Elective Cesarean section complicate severe haemorrhage , bowel injury require bowel manipulation , repair , resection anastomosis colostomy . Women require Cesarean hysterectomy . Women require Postpartum hysterectomy . Mothers severe preeclampsia . Mothers sickle cell disease . Mothers pregestational gestational diabetes .
